description: Integers with 2 or more consecutive anti-divisors.
comments: See A066272 for definition of anti-divisor.
links: Jon Perry, The Anti-divisor: Even More Anti-Divisors [Cached copy]
example: 22 has the anti-divisors 3,4,5,9 and 15 and therefore (3,4) and (4,5) form consecutive pairs.
author: _Jon Perry_, Jun 04 2002
